text:
「嘛……妳既然都這樣說了，那不妨考慮看看？ 體驗一下[redacted_name]的外貌？」
「欸！？ 我只是隨口說說而已……好吧，既然妳想我就體驗看看吧。」
「好，那麼[redacted_name]來開始吧。」 [redacted_name]的聲音充滿了興奮，她的眼神中閃爍著一絲挑逗。
[redacted_name]點了點頭，她的心情既緊張又期待，但同時也有一絲不安。
[redacted_name]開始幫[redacted_name]脫去她的衣物，一件一件地，小心翼翼地將每一件衣物摘下，直到[redacted_name]站在她面前一絲不掛。
「要跟妳的好身材暫時說再見了呢~」
trans:
"Well...since you said so, why not consider it over? Do you want to experience [redacted_name]'s appearance?"
"Huh!? I was just saying so casually...Okay, since you want it, I will try it out."
"OK, [redacted_name], let's begin." There was much excitement in [redacted_name]'s voice, and a glimmer of teasing in her eyes.
[redacted_name] knodded. She felt both anxious and expectant, while at the same time a trace of unease.
[redacted_name] began to help [redacted_name] take off her clothes. Piece by piece, she carefully took off every piece of clothes, until [redacted_name] stood naked in front of her.
"You will say goodbye to your nice figure temporarily~"
